name: Bouncy Buggy
description:
BOUNCY BUGGY!

Jump up! Drive forwards!

Make your way to the finish in this neon-vaporwave racing platformer.

This game is still in development. We hope to add more levels and to add a more complex rig for the car in the next update.

Bouncy Buggy is a game by Leon Arndt and Anika Handtke.

Made with lots of love in Germany <3

Music by Leon Arndt.
